summary: Black, Red and Gold. Standalone craftable version available.
descriptionHtml:
Done by request.

NOTES:
-Textures ONLY, you need the models from the original mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16870#
- The original armor was not craftable, but the standalone version makes this craftable in the Ebony section. (Daedric Perk required)
- If you download the replacer version, please see the original mod for location information.
-Yes the armor shines, but I reduced glow even more after taking the screens.

Used a lot of patterns and made it a whole lot darker, hopefully I didn\'t ruin it since it is a nice armor. If you find any problems with this mod please let me know and I\'ll try and get it fixed as soon as possible.

Feel free to add your own images and tell me what you think :)
Special thanks to cyb0rg88 for making the request!
author: Messias Mummo
